thread.title: Europe's migrant crisis is making it harder for Carnival to sell cruises
thread.title_full: Europe's migrant crisis is making it harder for Carnival to sell cruises

author: From businessinsider.com
title: Europe's migrant crisis is making it harder for Carnival to sell cruises
text: From businessinsider.com For most people, a vacation is supposed to be a relaxing, light-hearted escape from the stresses of everyday life. So it's not surprising that vacationers are scaling back in a region where humanity of Europe's migrant crisis is on full display. Carnival, the world's largest cruise line, addressed this with its quarterly earnings a few weeks ago. Here's CFO David Bernstein during the conference call after earnings were reported: "Overall, Continental Europe is probably more challenging. When you think about all of the economic difficulties and the geopolitical issues and the growing refugee concerns, that's the area that ... (
